bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: E. L. Bridges a/p and affadavit
Filed May 6th 1863 B. N. Sexton Clerk by L. E. Rector Deputy Clerk
County of Walla Walla Co E L Bridges D. V.

To attendance upon the District Court as a witness in this case of the Territory vs. J Sheridan from the first day of the trial of said Court - to wit - April 11th until the 6th day of May AD 1863 9 days at 2.00 per day
Territory of Washington County of Walla Walla ss

Personally appeared before the undersigned Clerk of this Dist Court 1st Judicial District E L Bridges and being duly sworn to me says the above account is correct and that he attended as a witness as stated
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 6th day of May A. D. 1863
B. N. Sexton Clerk by L. E. Rector Deputy Clerk
